meanings.definition: The quality or state of being petite.
meanings.sent1: Her petitenesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: I admire the petitenesses of delicate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's petitenesses made it seem even cuter.
meanings.sent4: The petitenesses of the tiny dollhouse was enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The petitenesses of the jewelry added a touch of elegance.
